description:
Find the real meaning of Christmas in A Charlie Brown Christmas™ Pinball! Join the Peanuts crew in putting on a play and decorating the most perfect tree there is.

Table features: 

- Snowflakes fall on the playfield, shoot the ball to eat them before they melt
- Feed Snoopy a snack by shooting his bowl
- Choose the perfect Christmas tree by shooting the right lanes
- Decorate Snoopy's house in Multiball to win the Lights and Display contest
- Direct the play in the Wizard mode and bring the Peanuts crew together to celebrate!
name: Pinball FX - A Charlie Brown Christmas™ Pinball
